subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: With a one-under-par 69 in the final round Sunday, Tiger Woods snared a two-shot victory over Woody Austin to claim his first major championship of the season and the 13th of his career.
snippet: With a one-under-par 69 in the final round Sunday, Tiger Woods snared a two-shot victory over Woody Austin to claim his first major championship of the season and the 13th of his career.
